messages.message:
[19:20:30] LOG.debug: From: apiato To: admin@admin.com Subject: Account Change Notice MIME-Version: 1.0 Date: Sat, 09 Nov 2024 19:20:30 +0000 Message-ID: <8ed980d45369ef21b813fa8c2260f198@example.com> Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=tCMGCFoY --tCMGCFoY Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable apiato: http://127.0.0.1:8000 # Hello! We wanted to let you know that some information was changed for your account: Your password has been change. If you recently made account changes, please disregard this message. However, if you did NOT make any changes to your account, we recommend you change your password and make appropriate corrections as soon as possible to ensure account security. Regards, apiato © 2024 apiato. All rights reserved. --tCMGCFoY Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable apiato
apiato

Hello!

We wanted to let you know that some information was changed for your account:

Your password has been change.

If you recently made account changes, please disregard this message. However, if you did NOT make any changes to your account, we recommend you change your password and make appropriate corrections as soon as possible to ensure account security.

Regards,
apiato

© 2024 apiato. All rights reserved.
--tCMGCFoY--
messages.label: debug

statements.sql: select "roles".*, "model_has_roles"."model_id" as "pivot_model_id", "model_has_roles"."role_id" as "pivot_role_id", "model_has_roles"."model_type" as "pivot_model_type" from "roles" inner join "model_has_roles" on "roles"."id" = "model_has_roles"."role_id" where "model_has_roles"."model_id" in (1) and "model_has_roles"."model_type" = 'App\Containers\AppSection\User\Models\User'

mails.subject: Account Change Notice
mails.headers:
From: apiato <hello@example.com>
To: admin@admin.com
Subject: Account Change Notice
mails.body:
apiato: http://127.0.0.1:8000

# Hello!

We wanted to let you know that some information was changed for your account:

Your password has been change.

If you recently made account changes, please disregard this message. However, if you did NOT make any changes to your account, we recommend you change your password and make appropriate corrections as soon as possible to ensure account security.

Regards,
apiato

© 2024 apiato. All rights reserved.
mails.html:
apiato

Hello!

If you recently made account changes, please disregard this message. However, if you did NOT make any changes to your account, we recommend you change your password and make appropriate corrections as soon as possible to ensure account security.

Regards,
apiato

© 2024 apiato. All rights reserved.
